description: Request to acquire pallet racks, including delivery and installation for the Department of National Defence, Montreal, Quebec, Canada. Supporting documentation and bids must be submitted by the latest at 2 PM on October 13, 2021. NoISBN APC, no APF, no MVP. Xref - no/2022-22A009
full_summary:
## W1985-22A009: Request for Proposal for Pallet Racks Acquisition Contract

### Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number:** WS3667856697
* **Publication Date:** September 21, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** October 13, 2022 (by 14:00 HAE)
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None

### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity:** Department of National Defence (DND)
* **Project Location:** DND Montreal, Québec, Canada

### Request for Proposal Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) is inviting proposals for the acquisition of pallet racks materials, including delivery and installation, for DND Montreal. The contract is expected to begin on November 30, 2022, and end on October 31, 2024.

### Proposal Requirements

All proposals must meet the requirements outlined in Section 7 of the tender document. Proposals must be submitted electronically through Ariba Discovery by 14:00 HAE on October 13, 2022. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

### Contact Information

* **Julie Carbonneau** (Department of Public Works and Government Services)
* **Email:** [julie.carbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:julie.carbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Additional Information

The tender document is available on the Government of Canada's Buyandsell website. The technical specifications and requirements can be downloaded from the Ariba Discovery website using the following link: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14165601](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14165601)

Note: The rewritten text has been condensed and the most relevant information has been included. The formatting has been changed to make it easier to read and understand. The text has also been rephrased to make it more professional and concise.
